text:
Chronomics | Onsite | London or Cambridge, UK

====================================

    * Backend Developer
    * Frontend developer
    * Creative Data Scientist
    * UX/UI Designer
    * Digital Marketer
====================================

Chronomics is an pioneering health tech start-up working on the most complex genetic (epigenetic) problems.

Tech stack: React/Go/PHP/AWS/Machine Learning

See https://www.chronomics.co.uk/careers for more info and to apply.
